commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks to everyone's cooperation, the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club is officially restarted!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We also have a new ultimate goal of participating in the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But I think we need to get more experience putting on shows and being onstage before we should worry about aiming for the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Do you mean doing events, like the one from the other day?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. In fact, there's an event coming up in exactly one month. What do you all think about performing there?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They have divisions for solo, duo, and group performances. I think it's a perfect fit for us.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Is it common for events to be split into divisions?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: No, I don't think it is. The school idol events I'm familiar with normally have one group per school. I don't recall them having separate divisions anywhere.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Saint Snow from Hokkaido is probably the most famous duo out there, but duos, in general, are pretty uncommon. Solo acts are even rarer.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: But I do feel like there are more events with multiple divisions these days.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's interesting to know.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: If you ask me, just the fact that it's not only about duos and groups makes it even more perfect for us!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The possibilities are endless when it comes to school idols!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wonder if there'll be people there who wear something like my Rina-chan Board. It'd be nice if I can find those like me!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Maybe there will be! Like Setsuna said, anything's possible when it comes to school idols!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: One exception! I don't think there are many, if any, school idols cuter than your's truly!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't think I even need to ask, but everyone is cool with entering as a solo act, right?

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Right!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Our first step should be to see what we can accomplish on our own.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I agree. I want to see what I'm capable of!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: And furthermore, I wanna see what our school's legendary mystery school idol, the infamous Setsuna Yuki, brings to the table!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: P-Please don't say that! You're embarassing me!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Okay, then. Do your best and get high ratings so we'll be in good shape for the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? We need to get high ratings?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I thought anyone who entered the School Idol Festival could perform.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Right. That's why it's referred to as a cultural festival for school idols.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Then why do we need to get high ratings?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's true that with it being like a culture festival, any school idol group can participate. However, 's and Aqours will be performing on the main stage.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: 's and Aqours are already booked, huh?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That makes sense. It's like how at music festivals, only the most popular bands can perform on the main stage, right?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I can see why those two groups would already have their slots.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Mm-hmm. To perform on the main stage, you need to qualify.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If we're going to have a big goal, I think that should be it. So let's get out there and start racking up accomplishments!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Understood! If that's what we've gotta do, then let's give it everything we've got!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It sounds like you've been doing a bunch of research. Thank you.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We'll do some studying up too.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yes, sorry we keep leaving you to do all the research.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, I'm the chief! I want to stick close to you all and do whatever I can to support your school idol activities!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Plus, I'm still a total newbie when it comes to school idols. Doing the information gathering is teaching me a lot, so don't worry about it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Leave all that stuff to me. You all are free to focus 100% on practicing!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Aww, that's so sweet! Maybe I'll let you in on my secret lunchtime nap spot. We can take a snooze together.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Kanata, no naps until the event is over.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's right, Kanata. You heard our chief. You need to work hard during lessons.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, but I heard on TV that a short nap can make you more productive.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Atta girl, Ayumu! You should lay your head down on a nice fluffy pillow and nap with me, too! But just a quick one. We need to focus on our lessons, like Karin said.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: If Kanata's actually agreeing to shorten her naps, she must be incredibly motivated!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: No fair, no fair! I wanna take a nap on a nice, fluffy pillow, too! Emma-chi, let's join the resistance and get some shut-eye!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh? Me?! S-Sure, but just a little catnap, okay?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Sweet! I get to lie down on a cushy Emma-chi pillow!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm cushy? You mean my belly? Sure, go ahead.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Grrr. I want in on all these airheaded remarks, too!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hmm? Kasumi, did you say something?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh? N-No, nothing at all! Oh, right! Shizuko, have you already decided what you wanna do at the event?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Well, we only just decided to join in right now, so no, not yet. But I guess I'd like to try something I failed at before, and see if I can do it now.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: How about you, Rina?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Umm, uhh... Rina-chan Board says, "Confused."

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: R-Rina, are you okay? Your face is beet red. Do you need to lie down?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Love you, Ayumu.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I need to organize all my ideas for this event as well!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Well, this is a surprise, Setsuna. I figured you to be the type who always keeps a stock of several performances ready at all times.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Huh? N-No way. You think too highly of me, Karin! I usually don't get things figured out until the last second.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I do agree it'd be better if I had a bunch of ideas ready to go beforehand, though.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* I always thought of you as this far-off presence, Setsuna. It's kind of a relief to hear you say all that.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Sigh* If anything, you seem like the type of girl who's always prepared, Karin.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hmm. I guess if I had to pick one or the other, I'd say I am. I always feel less stressed when I have a plan.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The event has been scheduled, and everyone's morale is high.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (All right! As chief, I need to do my best to support them all!)
